definition: in favor of a proposition, opinion, etc., in favor of an action or proposal etc., an argument in favor of a proposal
details:
adverb
- in favor of a proposition, opinion, etc.
adjective
- in favor of an action or proposal etc.
= example: in favor of an action or proposal etc.
noun
- an argument in favor of a proposal
- an athlete who plays for pay
= synonyms: professional
